Public Safety
Public Safety

[![](../ic?i=police&c2=transparent&c1=%2310345c&c3=%23ededed)Police Department](https://www.caldwelltx.gov/police)[![](../ic?i=firedepartment&c2=transparent&c1=%2310345c&c3=%23ededed)Fire & Rescue](https://www.caldwelltx.gov/fire)[![](../ic?i=star&c2=transparent&c1=%2310345c&c3=%23ededed)Emergency Management](javascript:;)[![](../ic?i=alert&c2=transparent&c1=%2310345c&c3=%23ededed)Animal Control](https://www.caldwelltx.gov/animalcontrol)

The City of Caldwell prioritizes the safety of its residents, visitors, and businesses. The community is protected by its dedicated Police Department and Volunteer Fire Department. The City is covered by the oversight of [Burleson County Emergency Management](javascript:;) for general emergency preparation and hazard mitigation programs, coordinating whole community emergency response during and after incidents and disasters.

[Outdoor Warning Sirens](javascript:;)

**What is a Passkey?**  
Imagine signing into your account as easily as unlocking your phone—no more worrying about remembering or typing a password. A passkey is a secure digital key that uses the safety features in your device to keep your account protected. It’s designed to be both simple to use and highly secure.  
Ready to experience a simpler, safer sign-in? Click the button above to create your passkey now.
